title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: Visiting familiar haunts and favorite places can be encouraging and enlightening today. Sometimes, a trip down Memory Lane is disheartening. Thankfully, this sentimental journey is refreshing because youre not likely trying to relive the past as much as learn from it. You might also rediscover parts of yourself long buried by years of daily grinding and distraction. Perhaps you even decide to dust off some dreams you once set aside. You dont need to act on these goals immediately, but remembering them may be enough to resurrect or reinvent them. Author Frank Sonnenberg wrote, Lessons in life will be repeated until they are learned. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
